column1: (a)   Neither  the  Director  General  of  Sports,  nor  the  Minister  of  Sports  have  the

column3: power  to  conduct  an  inquiry  into  a  complaint  arising  out  of  an  incident  that
occurs  in  a  sporting  event  conducted  by  SLARDAR,  unless  such  an  inquiry  is
being held in the exercise of the appellate jurisdiction conferred by the Minister
The  1st Respondent and  the  4th Respondent  acted  outside  their  jurisdiction  by
conducting an inquiry, and arriving at findings against the Petitioner.
